page.content: {Q:-Why are most patients addimitted? A:-It drops into two catergories a)An organic brain disorder. b)pressure of life outside. {Q:-Do they pay to stay in the D.H.S? A:-We have no private beds we have 0.5 of a bed which we share with Broadgates.You could have a private patients in either Broadgates or at De La Pole.The bit is in York. {Q:-Do patients go home at the weekend? A:-Yes,40 to 50 go home. {Q:-Do patients stay at hotels , {hospitals? A:-Yes,every-year on holiday.Different wardens take them on holidays to boarding-houses or campsites etc. {Q:-Do they work outside? A:-Use to,but now they don't. {Q:-Can patients buy and use their own {things? A:-Yes,we encourge them to do so.
